title: etcetera, etcetera
content:
[[div style="display: none;"]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:flopstyle]]
[[/div]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:centered-header-sigma-9]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:betterfootnotes]]

[[module CSS]]

.etc-table {
  background: #321f47;
  width: 100%;
  border-spacing: 2px;
  margin: 50px 0;
}

.entry-cell {
  text-align: center;
  padding: 0 10px;
  background: #fafafa;
}
.entry-cell.dark {
  background: #fafafa;
}
.entry-cell.entry-number {
  font-size: 200%;
  width: 25%;
}

[[/module]]

[[module css]]

.tcontainer {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: flex-start;
    align-content: space-between;
}

.caser {
    background-color: transparent;
    width: calc(11rem + 1.5vw);
    padding: 0px;
    margin: 6px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: solid 0px #000000;
    display: block;
    text-align: center;
    transition: transform .16s;
    line-height: 1.1;
    position: relative;
}

.caser:hover {
    transform: scale(1.52);
    z-index: 2;
}
.caser:focus-within {
    transform: scale(1.52);
    z-index: 2;
}

.caser:hover .hoverdesc,
.caser .hoverdesc:hover {
    margin-top: 0;
    opacity: 1;
    pointer-events: all;
}
.caser:focus-within .hoverdesc{
    margin-top: 0;
    opacity: 1;
    pointer-events: all;
}

.anchor {
    position: sticky;
    height:0;
    top: 0;
}

[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

Howdy! I'm Montague Etcetera,[[span class="fnnum"]].[[/span]][[span class="fncon"]]He/Him & They/Them[[/span]] a writer, digital artist, and game designer with a deep, abiding love for sci-fi & fantasy.

I can be found on [https://montagues.carrd.co/ various social media sites].

[[/div]]

||= [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-achievement-badges/Attendance.png width="100px"]] ||= Certificate Of Attendance || Post an Author Page, add to a Collaborative Log, and participate in an Official SCP Wiki Contest. ||
||= [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-achievement-badges/Art.png]] ||= Draw Me Like One Of Your [REDACTED] || Create an artwork page with a rating of at least +30. ||
||= [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-achievement-badges/Orange.png]] ||= Participation Trophy || Write an article rated at least +100 ||
||= [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-achievement-badges/Media.jpg]] ||= The Medium Is The Message || Author of at least 10 media files (images, audio, videos, etc.) that are used on the wiki. Must be original works released under a version CC-by-SA license compatible with the SCP Wiki. ||
||= [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-achievement-badges/TV.png]] ||= Look Ma! I'm On TV! || Have one of your works be featured on an off-site video, podcast, video game, etc. ||
||= [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-achievement-badges/Cycle.jpg]] ||= Level Up! || You've been a member of the SCP Wiki for one calendar year. ||
||= [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-achievement-badges/Apple.png]] ||= Skip Tutoring || Have an SCP draft thread you gave feedback on succeed on the main list.[[span class="fnnum"]].[[/span]][[span class="fncon"]]It was a Discord thread, but close enough.[[/span]] ||
||= [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-achievement-badges/Purple.png]] ||= Winning! || Win an SCP Wiki contest as an individual or part of a team, without being disqualified or otherwise having your entry invalidated. ||
||= [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-achievement-badges/1K.jpg]] ||= Thousandaire || Entered into any of the X000 contests (i.e. SCP-1000, SCP-2000, SCP-3000, etc.) ||
||= [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/calibri-s-mega-cool-art-page-it-s-mostly-just-icons-but-what/Extra%21%20Extra%21]] ||= Extra! Extra! || One of your articles has been featured on the front page. ||

[[/tab]]
